description: Try our easy to follow Moroccan Spicy Sausages recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Moroccan Spicy Sausages Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in chickpeas and couscous. Cover and cook for 5 minutes. Season, then stir through most of the parsley. Garnish with remaining parsley and almonds.
